Literature.Title: Inhibitory effect of short cationic homopeptides against Gram-positive bacteria
Literature.Author: Guzmán F, Ojeda C, Albericio F, Carvajal-Rondanelli P, Marshall S

Literature.Title: Inhibitory effect of short cationic homopeptides against Gram-negative bacteria.
Literature.Author: Carvajal-Rondanelli P, Aróstica M, Marshall SH, Albericio F, Álvarez CA, Ojeda C, Aguilar LF, Guzmán F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(40-50% Inhibition=10-20µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(20-30% Inhibition=10-30µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(10-20% Inhibition=20µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(30-40% Inhibition=30µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(20-30% Inhibition=30µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 10876(20-30% Inhibition=10-20µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(20-30% Inhibition=20µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(60-70% Inhibition=30µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(0-10% Inhibition=10µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(50-60% Inhibition=20µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(50-60% Inhibition=30µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ISP 72-01(20-30% Inhibition=10µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ISP 72-01(40-50% Inhibition=20µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ISP 72-01(50-60% Inhibition=30µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(20-30% Inhibition=10µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(80-90% Inhibition=20µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(90-100% Inhibition=30µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ISP 1833-99(30-40% Inhibition=10-20µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ISP 1833-99(90-100% Inhibition=30µM),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(0-10% Inhibition=20-30µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(10-20% Inhibition=20µM)
